entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Winnipeg (The Forks)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winnipeg - The Forks 04:00 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -25.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -30.6°C
Wind: N 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
